page.title: 05New Developments in March.
page.content: The{March/Chatteris Bypass}was opened in 1984,and was built to avoid having heavy traffic going through the town. The bypass is{West of March, travelling through an attractive Fenland route. { Mini factories}in the N.E.still have to send their traffic by the town centre route if travelling South. The{Rainbow Superstore}will open in {September 1985,}and is to open{6 days {a week,}with{late-night shopping}from {Wednesday}to{Friday.}The store is near the{bypass}and{railway.}It should encourage people to shop in{March, rather than{Wisbech}and{Peterborough. In{1986,the building of a prison}is to be started on{80 hectares of land in the{former Whitemoor Marshalling {Yards.}It will have 4 cell blocks for 500 prisoners. Gregory Fox. {
